content: when the weather starts to get cold here in michigan one of my favorite accessories to help beat the chill is an earwarmer i love that i can still wear my hair piled up all messy on the top of my head or if it s a good hair day down and wavy because a cozy earwarmer will look great either way this earwarmer is easy and quick don t let the #3 dk weight yarn fool you it will work up fast and still feel light on your head the seam is conveniently hidden underneath the button and although i am totally ok with a necessary seam i always get excited when i find a good hiding place for it
